func.title: GetEffectCount

param.name: mask
param.desc: Search mask for effect names. You can use '*' or '?' wildcards or specify an effect name directly. If unspecified, all effects are counted.

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object the effects of which you want to count. If unspecified, the global effects will be counted.

param.name: max_priority
param.desc: If not 0, only those effects are counted which have the specified priority or lower.

func.desc: Counts object effects or global effects.
